---
name: "Hades Breaching Drill"
type: "Special"
speed: "Immobile"
armour: "n/a"
cc: "n/a"
ff: "n/a"
special_rules:
  - "transport"
  - "tunneler"
notes:
  |
    May carry 8 Death Korps Engineer units. Note that the Hades Breaching Drill is not a unit and so may not be shot at nor have hits applied to it. It is in all respects simply a marker. No Blast Marker is generated for its parent Hades Breach Drill leaving the formation behind during the game.
---
